channel.title: MMA OVERDOSE (mp3)
channel.description: A Salt Lake City MMA Podcast. Every week Mike the Body, Da Baby Gorilla and Hurricane Hawes discuss the topics that plague the minds of MMA fans new and old. Our show is rife with great interviews with local MMA fighters, fight picks, MMA in the media and Beer vs. Beer. Join us for a good chuckle and some wisdom.
channel.itunes:author: MMA Overdose
channel.itunes:summary: A Salt Lake City MMA Podcast. Every week Mike the Body, Da Baby Gorilla and Hurricane Hawes discuss the topics that plague the minds of MMA fans new and old. Our show is rife with great interviews with local MMA fighters, fight picks, MMA in the media and Beer vs. Beer. Join us for a good chuckle and some wisdom.
channel.itunes:keywords: comedy, mma, salt lake city, utah, slc, fight, ufc, mixmartialarts

item.title: MMA OVERDOSE ep.14
item.itunes:author: MMA Overdose
item.itunes:summary: Hey everybody we would like to wish you all Happy Holidays from us here at MMA Overdose. Now this is our last episode for the year and the last episode for this podcast host. Due to the fact that we will be on KALL 700AM next years podcast format will be a little different. Stay Tune on our website to find out what we have going. This episode we cover basically the events from STRIKEFORCE and WEC. Mike Stidham of UCE joins us. It's another fun episode and thank you for tuning in. REMEMBER TO CHECK OUT www.mmaoverdose.com for info on the show.
item.description: Hey everybody we would like to wish you all Happy Holidays from us here at MMA Overdose. Now this is our last episode for the year and the last episode for this podcast host. item.title: MMA OVERDOSE Ep.13
item.itunes:author: MMA Overdose
item.itunes:summary: Mike the Body and Da Baby Gorilla bring you another jam pack show. Which two stars are fighting in the upcoming televised Strikeforce card. An interim title is on the line. The curse of UFC 108 and UFC 107 recap. Check it out peeps.
item.description: Mike the Body and Da Baby Gorilla bring you another jam pack show. Which two stars are fighting in the upcoming televised Strikeforce card. An interim title is on the line. The curse of UFC 108 and UFC 107 recap. Check it out peeps.
item.itunes:keywords: mma, utah, comedy, mma overdose, ufc, ufc107, Action

item.title: MMA OVERDOSE EP.12
item.itunes:author: MMA Overdose
item.itunes:summary: The Boys of Mayhem bring you another kick ass episode. We recap The Ultimate Fighter Finale. Jordan Smith goes two on one with Mike and Mark. Hendo signs with Strikeforce and we get pick the winners for UFC 107.
item.description: The Boys of Mayhem bring you another kick ass episode. We recap The Ultimate Fighter Finale. Jordan Smith goes two on one with Mike and Mark. Hendo signs with Strikeforce and we get pick the winners for UFC 107.
item.itunes:keywords: ufc 107, henderson, comedy, mma, jordan smith, salt lake cityy

item.title: MMA OVERDOSE Ep.11
item.itunes:author: MMA Overdose
item.itunes:summary: Hurrican Hawes and Da Baby Gorilla deliver a fantastic show for you fight fans. California Athletic Commission will discipline fighters with a medical marijuana card. Dana white accepts M-1 Bisons challenge. Tito may be responsible for Henderson's departure. Some fight rumors and The Ultimate Fighter Finale recap. This is one of the funniest episodes to date.
item.description: Hurrican Hawes and Da Baby Gorilla deliver a fantastic show for you fight fans. California Athletic Commission will discipline fighters with a medical marijuana card. Dana white accepts M-1 Bisons challenge. Tito may be responsible for Henderson's departure. Some fight rumors and The Ultimate Fighter Finale recap. This is one of the funniest episodes to date.
item.itunes:keywords: mma, salt lake city, comedy, fights, ultimate fighter, ufc

item.title: MMA OVERDOSE Ep.10
item.itunes:author: MMA Overdose
item.itunes:summary: Jose "Da Baby Gorilla" and "Hurricane" Hawes recap UFC 105; discuss the M-1 challenge to the Dana; poke fun of DMX demise at "Thunder" promotion and much much more. It's an hour and ten minutes of fun. Why so long? Well lets say we had an MMA Overdose.
item.description: Jose "Da Baby Gorilla" and "Hurricane" Hawes recap UFC 105; discuss the M-1 challenge to the Dana; poke fun of DMX demise at "Thunder" promotion and much much more. It's an hour and ten minutes of fun. Why so long? Well lets say we had an MMA Overdose.
item.itunes:keywords: comedy, mma, utah, salt lake city, ufc 106, dmx, steve, razor, sharp

item.title: MMA OVERDOSE Ep.9
item.itunes:author: MMA Overdose
item.itunes:summary: The boys recap STRIKEFORCE: Fedor vs. Rogers and other things that are circulating through the MMA world. Check out their picks for UFC 105 and their reaction to "EA MMA". Fun show for the whole family. 9/10 mothers approve.
item.description: The boys recap STRIKEFORCE: Fedor vs. Rogers and other things that are circulating through the MMA world. Check out their picks for UFC 105 and their reaction to "EA MMA". Fun show for the whole family. 9/10 mothers approve.
item.itunes:keywords: strikeforce, ufc 105, comedy, mma, salt lake city, utah

item.title: MMA OVERDOSE Ep.8
item.itunes:author: MMA Overdose
item.itunes:summary: Hurricane Hawes, Mike The Body and Da Baby Gorilla recap TUF and get deep into the quarter final matches. M-1 sues Affliction for breach of contract which does not set well for the boys and injuries plague the sport watched by millions. Since Strikeforce is debuting on national television the gang dissect and give their predictions on the upcoming "STRIKEFORCE: FEDOR vs. ROGERS". Be part of the magic and listen to the show.
item.description: Hurricane Hawes, Mike The Body and Da Baby Gorilla recap TUF and get deep into the quarter final matches. item.itunes:keywords: strikeforce, mma, utah, slc, comedy, tuf, fedor, rogers

item.title: MMA OVERDOSE Ep 7
item.itunes:author: MMA Overdose
item.itunes:summary: Mike Stidham, owner of Ultimate Combat Experience, joins Mark and Jose for a razzing good time. The conversation starts out with Mike's mullet from High School and then things get heated up as Da Baby Gorilla demands an opponent for his upcoming MMA debut in 2010.
item.description: Mike Stidham, owner of Ultimate Combat Experience, joins Mark and Jose for a razzing good time. The conversation starts out with Mike's mullet from High School and then things get heated up as Da Baby Gorilla demands an opponent for his upcoming MMA debut in 2010.
item.itunes:keywords: uce, comedy, mma, utah, stidham, mark, jose, ultimate combat experience

item.title: MMA OVERDOSE Ep. 6
item.itunes:author: MMA Overdose
item.itunes:summary: Da Baby Gorilla goes one on one with Derek "The Gentleman" Downey as they discussed his fight at Fight Night 17 and his upcoming headline fight at Horns Elite. Mike and Jose discuss the Machida/Shogun fight as well as the other fights of UFC 104. Big news hits hard as Lesnar pulls out of the fight with Shane Carwin and other great MMA topics. Plus question number 2 for the ultimate prize; a shirt signed by over 22 MMA fighters.
item.description: Da Baby Gorilla goes one on one with Derek "The Gentleman" Downey as they discussed his fight at Fight Night 17 and his upcoming headline fight at Horns Elite. Mike and Jose discuss the Machida/Shogun fight as well as the other fights of UFC 104. Big news hits hard as Lesnar pulls out of the fight with Shane Carwin and other great MMA topics. Plus question number 2 for the ultimate prize; a shirt signed by over 22 MMA fighters.
item.itunes:keywords: derek the gentleman downey, ufc 104, slc, mma, comedy fights, podcast, salt lake city, mike, jose

item.title: MMA OVERDOSE Ep. 5
item.itunes:author: MMA Overdose
item.itunes:summary:
Mike takes a leave of absent due to Jose being sick (Seriously it was just a cough). Mark and Jose discuss about the return of Gilbert Yvel, Dancing with the Stars, TUF 10, their UFC 104 picks and a few other things that fans must know.
Make sure to listen to this episode in order for you to win an exclusive shirt signed by over 22 MMA fighters: Forrest Griffin, Patrick Cote, Nate Diaz, Nate Quarry, Shane Carwin, Cain Velasquez and others. Deadline for this question will be 10/30/2009. One entry per person.
item.description:
Mike takes a leave of absent due to Jose being sick (Seriously it was just a cough). Mark and Jose discuss about the return of Gilbert Yvel, Dancing with the Stars, TUF 10, their UFC 104 picks and a few other things that fans must know.
Make sure to listen to this episode in order for you to win an exclusive shirt signed by over 22 MMA fighters: Forrest Griffin, Patrick Cote, Nate Diaz, Nate Quarry, Shane Carwin, Cain Velasquez and others. Deadline for this question will be 10/30/2009. One entry per person.
item.itunes:keywords: mma, slc, salt lake city, fights, comedy, mixed martial arts

item.title: MMA OVERDOSE Ep. 4
item.itunes:author: MMA Overdose
item.itunes:summary: Due to Mark being preoccuppied with his lady, Mike and Jose take over the show and discuss about MMA fans turn DWTS fans, Kimb Slice philosophy, Thiago vs Rashad, Alabama Throwdown, Rampage and a special mock interview with rapper turned fighter DMX.
item.description: Due to Mark being preoccuppied with his lady, Mike and Jose take over the show and discuss about MMA fans turn DWTS fans, Kimb Slice philosophy, Thiago vs Rashad, Alabama Throwdown, Rampage and a special mock interview with rapper turned fighter DMX.
item.itunes:keywords: dmx, mike, jose, mma, slc, salt lake city, media, ufc, tuf

item.title: MMA OVERDOSE Ep. 3
item.itunes:author: MMA Overdose
item.itunes:summary: Utah's very own MMA badass, Steven "Razor" Sharp, joins the boys of SLC MMA Mayhem to discuss about his upcoming battle with John Gunderson for the MMA X-Plosion title. Other topics that were discussed included the results of Fight Night 19 and UFC 103. Steve shares his passion of the sport as well as his history of being a super hero. Seriously have you ever heard of anyone getting their ass kicked just because they cut someone off? If you have it was probably the "Razor". Get your umbrellas out before listening to this show. Why? Because it's about to rain elbows. Catch the comedy with MMA.

item.title: MMA OVERDOSE EP. 2
item.itunes:author: MMA Overdose
item.itunes:summary: Mike the Body disses on Mark and Jose for giving out wrong information on the first show. The boys discuss the fights between Don Frye and Dave Herman as well as SLC own Jeremy Horn. They also talk about MMA stars in Movies and the upcoming UFC Fight Night 19 and UFC 103. The return of a segment long forgotten; BEER Vs. BEER.
item.description: Mike the Body disses on Mark and Jose for giving out wrong information on the first show. item.title: MMA OVERDOSE Ep. 1
item.itunes:author: MMA Overdose
item.itunes:summary: Welcome to MMA Overdose. Join host Mike the Body, Hurricane Hawes and Da Baby Gorilla as they talk about one of the fastest rising sports in this millenium. This isn't your average MMA show where the host try to force you knowledge. NO! This show is hosted by real fans of the sport with little to some knowledge.

item.itunes:keywords: mma reality, slc, utah, comedy, mma, jose, mark, fight
